title: 48 A Conversation on Poetry, Life, and the Vulnerability of Pursuing Dreams with IN-Q
description:
Los Angeles based rapper, actor, teacher, songwriter, and award winning spoken word artist, In-Q is a unique voice in entertainment. His work has been featured on HBO's Def Poetry Jam, two seasons of Verses & Flow, the Discovery Channel, the Disney Channel, Nickelodeon, EA Sports, ABC, NBC, and A&E.
In-Q is a National Poetry Slam Champion The School of Greatness.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
